template.name: Template App Zimbra Statistics
template.description:
Need script in zabbix/scripts and cron task
Stats Collection
https://wiki.zimbra.com/wiki/Server_Monitoring

trigger.name: Number of mail in queue is high on {HOST.NAME} ({ITEM.LASTVALUE} mails)
Number of mail in queue is too high on {HOST.NAME} ({ITEM.LASTVALUE} mails)
